title: Did I make the right decision?
content: I took cse-aiml in ec campus but after reading through the faqs I'm not sure if my choice is right, is there any chance tht I can take my minors related to cse like they claimed during counseling about how about ece student took cse minor and can pursue cse masters or is there anything else I can do?

comments.body: Read the more recent posts. There's now hardly any difference between cse and aiml
